Aug. 20, 1927 D Lincoln Contest
Lincoln Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest

Test Piece Contest
Poetic Fancies
Lincoln Arboretum, Lincoln, Lincolnshire, England, UK Arranged as part of the Cyclists' Carnival. The carnival was postponed due to rain, but the band contest went ahead Prizes - 1st £7 and shield, 2nd £4.10s., 3rd £2.10s. 5 bands competed.
Dec. 20, 2013, 4:43 p.m. March 20, 2020, 10:52 a.m.
